Footnotes

by David Westbrook

This is to demo footnotes.

Chunk of text1 and some more2.

Blah blah blah

And yet3 more goes here.

#=sourcedcode footnotes.pod

#######################################

3. Some about stuff
blah about "yet";

1. Something about "chunk";

2. Something about "more";
